Change Log
==========

0.1.0 (2/5/2022)
----------------
- First release

0.1.5 (3/5/2022)
----------------
- Package running with no issues

0.2.0 (4/5/2022)
----------------
- New parameters added to table outputs and some parameters renamed

0.3.0 (4/5/2022)
----------------
- New function for the driver info

0.3.1 (6/5/2022)
----------------
- Now the function get_driver_info can send special chars

0.4.0 (11/5/2022)
-----------------
- Now the function race_has_sprint returns data for future races

0.4.1 (11/5/2022)
-----------------
- Minor fixes and Optimizations in some of the functions
